description:
Robin and her CP9 brethren seek to settle unfinished business with Iceberg. The Straw Hats have a plan to clear their names, but the assassins are one step ahead of them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aizu wa Hougeki to Tomoni! Ugokidashita CP9
Au signal, à l’explosion ! Le CP9 passe à l’action !
Cannon Fire Is the Signal! CP9 Goes Into Action!
Взрыв послужит сигналом! CP9 в действии
الإشارة هي طلقة المدفع! تحرّك سي بي 9
合図は砲撃と共に! 動き出したCP9
